name: Demo (PantheraOnline)
description:
Just a little game I made to improve my programming skills.

Run through levels, collect coins, avoid spikes, and break things to get to the end with your best time. Also there's a friendly little fox waiting to see you at the end of each level.

A tip: if you are on a wall and press a directional key then jump you will jump in that direction. Use this to jump to different walls or jump up walls faster.

(no in game sound as of now)

This project has no real name and is tagged as "prototype" because I did not originally intend on making a platformer. This is a stepping stone to the platform fighter I intended on making but it serves as a demo for the mechanics I have made so far. Reviews are greatly appreciated to help me make the project more fun.

This project was also not originally intended to be a web game that ran in the browser but I saw that I could so I did to allow for more accessibility but testing for this was not extensive so the downloaded version will be better, at least visually.

All art was found here on itch. Check out the credits from the main menu to see all the artists.
